title: Episode 175: Time to Bloom with Doree Shafrir
itunes:title: Episode 175: Time to Bloom with Doree Shafrir
itunes:subtitle: Finally, it’s The One Where Kate Interviews Doree! In celebration of Doree’s new book Thanks for Waiting: The Joy (& Weirdness) of Being a Late Bloomer, they discuss her life as a late bloomer, her writing process, how she handles rejection, and ti...
description:
Finally, it’s The One Where Kate Interviews Doree! In celebration of Doree’s new book Thanks for Waiting: The Joy (& Weirdness) of Being a Late Bloomer, they discuss her life as a late bloomer, her writing process, how she handles rejection, and tips on dating.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter


This episode is sponsored by:
